column1: Konz (Latin: Contionacum) is a city in the Trier-Saarburg district
column3: Germany. It is situated at the confluence of the rivers Saar and Moselle

column1: Konz is the seat of the Verbandsgemeinde ("collective municipality") Konz. The following villages are part of the municipality Konz:

column3: formed part of the Saar Protectorate.
